E1EDKT2.TDLINE: Function Header comments are used to describe the purpose of a
function. Every function must have a separate header comment. F
unction headers serve to describe the algorithm which the funct
ion implements without forcing the reader to interpret code.

en. The system attaches the comments to the selected order lin
e item. To enter a comment for a different line item, return t
